Usage: git-ws status [OPTIONS] [PATHS]...

  Run 'git status' on PATHS or all files (displayed paths include the actual
  clone path).

Options:
  -b, --branch               show branch information
  -B, --banner               show banner of each project
  -M, --manifest FILE        Manifest file. Initial/Configuration settings by
                             default.
  -G, --group-filter FILTER  Group Filtering. TODO: more details. Initial
                             clone/init filter settings by default.
  -h, --help                 Show this message and exit.
